DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test hypothesis addition dexmedetomidine fentanyl-based intravenous patient control analgesia ( PCA ) reduce requirement fentanyl bolus consequent postoperative nausea vomit high-risk patient undergo lumbar spine surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Combination Dexmedetomidine Added Fentanyl-based Intravenous Patient-controlled Analgesia Nausea Vomiting Highly Susceptible Patients Undergoing Lumbar Spinal Surgery : Prospective Double Blinded Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: 1. female , nonsmoking patient 2065 age schedule elective lumbar spine surgery 1 . Bradycardia EKG ( 45bpm ) 2 . Atrioventricular conduction disorder 3 . Uncontrolled hypertension 4. angina history 5. obesity ( BMI â‰¥ 30 kg/m2 ) 6 . Preoperative administration opioid 7 . Preoperative administration antiemetic 8 . Gastrointestinal disorder history 9 .
